metadata.title: CVE-2021-44460 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in Odoo Community 13.0 and earlier and OdooEnterprise 13.0 and earlier allows users with deactivated accounts toaccess the system with the deactivated account and any permission it stillholds, via crafted RPC requests.

criterions.comment: odoo package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
